gear.name: eeg-classifier
gear.label: Brain Vision EEG Classifier
gear.description: Classifies Brain Vision EEG data and appends metadata attributes to the file's custom info structure within Flywheel. Input to this gear is a Flywheel packaged EEG archive (.eeg.zip) containing Brain Vision EEG data (in .vhdr format). Output is a JSON file (.metadata.json) containing metadata that will be used by the Flywheel platform to populate the input file's custom info fields.

file.description: Brain Vision EEG data file packaged in Flywheel zip format (.eeg.zip).

gear.author: Travis Richardson

invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for Brain Vision EEG Classifier
